line_1: He said, and from him shook the falling Ice,
line_2: When to him thus th'enliven'd Youth replies.
His mornings were not spent in vice,

line_1: Harden'd to Stone, or froze to Ice?
line_2: And stoop t' embrace me from the Skies!
